In a message dated 2/23/03 10:07:27 PM Central Standard Time, 
airly2002@... writes:


> Hydras slighty laughted "My dear Maxima, that beast mode fit you 
> very well..."and he moved close to her and took one of her 
> hands "Cunning, beauty, fierce and mercyless as... a Tiger "

She only gazed at him. She really had not seen the organic animals. Her 
programming, spirit, or whatever you called it, was what made her... as well 
as what all she had gone through. 

Glancing down at her paw/hand in his, then looking back up at him. Many 
things rushed through her meta processor, but nothing of compassion or the 
sort. She was oblivious to it.. or so she thought. Never was it something 
that she allowed. She had to make herself as meriless, cunning, ruthless, 
fierce, .... unfeeling... as possible just to be the Decepticon she was.  

But, it was Megatron who stirred something in her. A fire, not of the sort of 
desire that she thought, but a passion to win, to continue to dominate, to 
conquer.... as well as ... something else?  

If so, she never allowed it. She couldn't. But... now... this techno organic 
form was stirring emotions she had subdued so well. It was hard to control 
them. She only gazed at him, like in a trance. She somehow could feel the 
part that was once Megatron in him.... it called out to her like a beating 
drum. 

"Decepticons must be merciless. It is our destiny to conquer." She told him 
with such confindence in her feline voice.

--part1_9d.3505ac34.2b8b0955_boundary
